'-----------------------
#org 0x165D9A

goto 0x8165DBE
end

if 0x1 call 0x8165E26
compare 0x4001 0x2
if 0x1 call 0x8165E42
msgbox 0x817E6C7 '"If you have the right stuff,\ngo ta..."
callstd 0x4
closeonkeypress
applymovement 0x5 0x8165D83
waitmovement 0x0
fadedefault
hidesprite 0x5
clearflag 0x2E
releaseall
end

#org 0x165DBE

closeonkeypress
playsong 0x110 0x0
compare 0x4001 0x0
if 0x1 call 0x8165E0A
compare 0x4001 0x1
if 0x1 call 0x8165E26
compare 0x4001 0x2
if 0x1 call 0x8165E42
msgbox 0x817E6C7 '"If you have the right stuff,\ngo ta..."
callstd 0x4
closeonkeypress
applymovement 0x5 0x8165D83
waitmovement 0x0
fadedefault
hidesprite 0x5
clearflag 0x2E
releaseall
end

= Welcome to the POKÈMON WIRELESS\nCLUB DIRECT CORNER.\pYou may interact directly with\nyour friends here.\pWhich room would you like to\nenter?

= Would you like to use the\nBERRY CRUSH System?

= Please wait.\n[.] [.] B Button: Cancel

#org 0x1BD390
= There are three Battle Modes.\pSINGLE BATTLE is for two TRAINERS\nwith one or more POKÈMON each.\pEach TRAINER can have one POKÈMON\nin battle at a time.\pDOUBLE BATTLE is for two TRAINERS\nwith two or more POKÈMON each.\pEach TRAINER will send out two\nPOKÈMON in battle at a time.\pMULTI BATTLE is for four TRAINERS\nwith one or more POKÈMON each.\pEach TRAINER can have one POKÈMON\nin battle at a time.

= To use the BERRY CRUSH service,\nyou must have at least one BERRY.
